achievement.title: First Blood!
achievement.text: Finished the tutorial so quickly? You must be a genius!

achievement.title: Warming Up!
achievement.text: Kill 25 enemies.

achievement.title: In the Kill Zone
achievement.text: Kill 50 enemies.

achievement.title: Bloodbath
achievement.text: Kill 100 enemies.

achievement.title: Rampage
achievement.text: Kill 250 enemies.

achievement.title: Slaughter House
achievement.text: Kill 500 enemies. Are you sure this is the game for you?

achievement.title: Golden God
achievement.text: Smite 1000 enemies with your Golden Finger.

achievement.title: Murder Mayhem
achievement.text: Destroy 2000 enemies. Are you getting used to the feeling of killing yet?

achievement.title: The Devil +1
achievement.text: Kill 6666 enemies. If 666 is the number of the devil, then this is a new level of evil.

achievement.title: Robot Assassin
achievement.text: Slay 88888 enemies. Are you sure you aren't botting?

achievement.title: Total Psycho
achievement.text: After 999999 kills, you've become a certified psychopath.

achievement.title: TestCase #11 - Kill 9999999 enemies
achievement.text: /* This is an auto test case, DO NOT USE IT ON REAL HUMAN! */

achievement.title: My Device is Worthy
achievement.text: Your device still works after surpassing an attack power of 100.

achievement.title: Training - 10K Hours
achievement.text: It's hard to believe you've spent 10,000 hours on this game!

achievement.title: Yet Another Epic Game In History
achievement.text: It's time for us to play this game for you!

achievement.title: Unachievable
achievement.text: It is impossible to get this achievement.

achievement.title: Cheater!
achievement.text: Try to finish this game by using cheats.

achievement.title: Shame On You!
achievement.text: Increase your attack power without using in-app purchases or upgrading your character.

achievement.title: Tech Failure
achievement.text: Decrease your attack power without using in-app purchases or downgrading your character.

achievement.title: Weakling
achievement.text: Have an attack power of less than 1. It's hard to imagine how anyone could be so weak.

achievement.title: The Hand of God
achievement.text: Finish gossiping with the developer and gain his favor.

achievement.title: A Road of Pain and Destruction
achievement.text: Unlock all achievements.

achievement.title: ↑↑↓↓←→←→BABA
achievement.text: This is the cheat code for the game. Do you trust me?

achievement.title: Hello World
achievement.text: Everyone gets this achievement. Don't feel too special.
